name: Will You Continue?
description:
Will you Continue?  This game is a platformer build for the "A Game By Its Cover" game jam.

In Will you continue?, you play as a saw like character navigating through crazy fonts  lasers, and enemy saws all while breaking through walls and collecting as many points as you can. Try competing with friends to see who can get the highest score, that is if you can continue.

Player control is just a swipe of the mouse. No keys necessary.
